Hero.headline: Let the best ideas win
Hero.subtitle: Torvi runs single-elimination tournaments where your team votes image vs image until you find the winning idea. Simple, visual, and fun.

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Each participant uploads images representing their ideas or proposals.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Torvi automatically generates a single-elimination tournament with all the ideas.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: Each round, the team chooses between two ideas until a winner is crowned.

Features.title: Features
Features.item1Desc: Ideas compete image vs image in single-elimination brackets.
Features.item2Desc: Live results via WebSocket. Watch the tournament progress instantly.
Features.item3Desc: Share an invite link. Participants join with a code, zero friction.
Features.item4Desc: Voters can participate anonymously for more honest decisions.
Features.item5Desc: Full visual bracket with the history of each round and the winning idea.
Features.item6Desc: High-performance Rust backend. Integrate Torvi into your own workflow.

OpenSource.title: Open Source
OpenSource.desc: Torvi is open source, built with Rust and Rocket.rs. Contribute, deploy your own instance, or use it as a base for your project.
